attributes.action: Change the St George’s Cross back to Red and White on the New England Kit.
attributes.background: Ensure that the red and white cross of St George is not changed in anyway!! This is our nations flag and it should not be changed in anyway.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
